page.title: 20BROOKLANDS SCHOOL, STAFFORD
page.content: People taking part in the Domesday Project were:- Pupils of Form I 1985/86: Fiona Billington James Bullmore Victoria Ford Andrew Jones Lorna Kinloch Andreas Kyriacou Sonia Leek Jonathan Martland Sarah McConnell Christopher Parks Katy Rees Christopher Saunders Lee Sharp Victoria Slater William Turner Pupils of Forms V and VI 1985/86. Mrs Y Allen - Form I Teacher and Project Co-ordinator Mrs J Gregory - Form VI Teacher and Computing Mrs C Jones - Geography Teacher Mrs P Goggin - Secretary We are an Independent Preparatory Day School for children of 3+ to 13+. We are situated 3 miles to the south east of the area we have surveyed.
